Title: The Witches of Eastwick
Actors: Jack Nicholson, Cher, Susan Sarandon, Michelle Pfeiffer
Plot: Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 11 nominations.
Production: Warner Brothers, Kennedy Miller Productions, Guber-Peters Company
